it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.network

Class VirtualClientSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.adrenalina.network.VirtualClientSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientInterface, java.lang.Runnable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class VirtualClientSocket
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientInterface, java.lang.Runnable
    Virtual client socket. Relays events over the network to the actual client socket.
